SEARCH
Package LoginPage

Class ChangePassword

java.lang.Object
LoginPage.ChangePassword
public class ChangePassword extends Object
The ChangePassword class provides functionality for changing a user's password in the application, including password validation and hashing.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • ChangePassword

      public ChangePassword()
      Default constructor for the ChangePassword class.

  • Method Details

    • changePassword

      public static void changePassword(String id)
      Changes the password for a user identified by the given user ID. It verifies the old password, validates the new password, and updates the password in the database file.
      Parameters:
      id - the user ID for which the password needs to be changed

    • hashPassword

      public static String hashPassword(String password, String salt) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeySpecException
      Hashes a password using PBKDF2 with HMAC SHA-256.
      Parameters:
      password - the password to be hashed
      salt - the salt to be used in the hashing process
      Returns:
      the Base64-encoded hashed password
      Throws:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the specified algorithm is not available
      InvalidKeySpecException - if the key specification is invalid

    • generateSalt

      public static String generateSalt()
      Generates a random salt for use in password hashing.
      Returns:
      a Base64-encoded random salt

    • verifyPassword

      public static boolean verifyPassword(String password, String salt, String storedHash) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeySpecException
      Verifies a password against a stored hash using the provided salt.
      Parameters:
      password - the password to verify
      salt - the salt used during the password hashing process
      storedHash - the stored hash to compare against
      Returns:
      true if the password matches the stored hash, false otherwise
      Throws:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the specified algorithm is not available
      InvalidKeySpecException - if the key specification is invalid

    • isValidPassword

      public static boolean isValidPassword(String password)
      Validates the strength of a password based on specific criteria. The password must be at least 8 characters long and contain letters, digits, and special characters.
      Parameters:
      password - the password to validate
      Returns:
      true if the password meets the strength criteria, false otherwise
